pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Wrapper for 'BayesFactor' Package // Provides helper functions that make it easy to run 'BayesFactor' package tests on a data which is in a tidy format. Additionally, it provides a more consistent syntax and by default returns a dataframe with rich details. These functions can also return expressions containing results from Bayes Factor tests that can then be displayed on custom plots.
